FuncDef: This command is used to print relevant multicast information from the target multicast router. Information displayed includes adjacency information, protocol, metrics, thresholds, and flags from the target multicast route.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the multicast-capable target router. Values-ipv4 unicast address (a.b.c.d).
Specifies the DNS name (if DNS name resolution is configured), up to 63 characters.
Specifies the router name or service ID for the router instance. Values-router-name: Base. ParamDefault: Default- Base
Specifies the service name up to 64 characters in length.
